code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./ThemeAccordion.css';import{themeConfig}from'../data/themeConfig';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ThemeAccordion=_ref=>{let{currentTheme,isOpen,onToggle}=_ref;const getThemeDescription=themeName=>{const theme=themeConfig.find(t=>t.name===themeName);return(theme===null||theme===void 0?void 0:theme.description)||"Experience the authentic Korean dining atmosphere.";};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"theme-accordion",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"theme-accordion-button",onClick:onToggle,"aria-label":`${isOpen?'Collapse':'Expand'} theme information`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"theme-title-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"theme-title",children:currentTheme.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{className:`caret-icon ${isOpen?'open':''}`,width:"20",height:"20",viewBox:"0 0 24 24",fill:"none",stroke:"currentColor",strokeWidth:"2",strokeLinecap:"round",strokeLinejoin:"round",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("path",{d:"m6 9 6 6 6-6"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`theme-description ${isOpen?'open':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:getThemeDescription(currentTheme.name)})})]});};export default ThemeAccordion;
